article.class: fl-post post-6 page type-page status-publish hentry

p.span: As the governor stated earlier today, we will not be returning to the school buildings this year and the spring sports seasons have been canceled. More information will be sent out next week.
We are all in this together! #WolverineCountry

a.span: Public Hearing - Sale of Mallard Land

div.p: The West Bend-Mallard school will provide quality and equitable educational experiences to prepare all students to be responsible and productive citizens committed to life-long learning.
